column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I needed to get from my house to work , but my car wouldn ' t start .
#text=I decided my best option was to take the bus .
#text=I walked down the street to the nearest bus stop that would take me close to work .
#text=I waited for about five minutes for the bus to come .
#text=Once I got on , I put my money in the machine and headed towards the back to find a seat .
#text=There were only three open seats so I took one of them and popped in my ear buds to listen to music .
#text=I also brought a book along to read so nobody would try to talk to me .
#text=The bus made three stops before we got to the corner nearest to my work .
#text=Each time people would get off and as they shuffled past would bump into my knees which was really annoying .
#text=Then more people would get on and some would find seats , but others had to stand .
#text=One person stood directly in front of me , in constant contact with my legs .
#text=I don ' t like riding public transportation .
#text=Finally we got to my stop and I got out of the bus through the rear doors .
